content.description: Climb the left side of the slab below the roof.  At the roof, trend right, clipping two bolts on the way through a steep, burly crux section.  Keep heading right, until the terrain gets easier and you can get some protection in.  Then go up to the anchors (out of sight above the steep stuff).
content.location:
This ascends the roof/arch feature to the left of

Party of of Bounds

.

content.description: Find the climb at the left side of the Ophir Wall, to the right of a prominent roof/arch.  If you look closely, you'll see a few pins that have been banged in a long time ago in the front of an overhanging pillar.  Climb up on great holds, with some long reaches here and there, clipping the pitons as you go.  Be ready to place some of your own gear at your discretion - the pitons get fewer and farther between.  Climb fast so you don't pump out!
content.location: The Party Out of Bounds section is on the left of the Ophir Wall.

content.description: Climb up the slab (~.9 R), trending right towards a crack for protection. Then head back left, and pull the steep roof with bolts. Climb straight up from there past two more bolts and several gear placements.
content.protection: 4 bolts, doubles 0.3-.75, and single micros. Offset cams are helpful.
content.location: Start dead center of the slab, just left of the bushes.
